medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and right upper quadrant pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began suddenly while walking and has been steady since that time. It is described as sharp and radiating to her side and back. Patient denies any associated nausea, vomiting, fever, or history of similar symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidemia, obstructive sleep apnea, fibroids, endometriosis.
medical_history.family_history: Hypertension in both parents, breast cancer in aunt who died, liver cancer in aunt who died, diabetes in brother.
